column1: Kata Robata////For the second go around
column4: and the strawberry shortcake. All were delish. Maybe it's b/c customer service was better
column5: but I def felt like my food selection was tastier than last one. I could see why ppl order the kimchi grits for itself. My sister described it as kimchi mashed potatoes. The kobe beef
column7: melted in my food. My favorite portion still is the dessert. I agreed with baby sis that the strawberry shortcake tasted like strawberry yogurt (in a good way!)
